summary: After their grandfather dies, cousins Jairo and Marina go to Colombia to discover their ancestral land and learn more about their heritage in an attempt to reclaim their grandpa's legacy.
cast: Paola Baldion|Ana María Arango|Héctor Durango|Carolina Lizarazo|Ricardo Niño|Ramses Ramos|Edgardo Román|Julián Román|Salma Tafur
title: Retratos en un mar de mentiras
